Description_lang: $?(c1|c2|c3)[][The duration of Avenging Wrath is increased by $s1%.]$?c1[Avenging Wrath and Avenging Crusader reduce Holy Shock's cooldown by $s2%,]?c2[Avenging Wrath and Sentinel cause Judgment to generate $s3 additional Holy Power,]?c3[Avenging Wrath and Crusade cause each Holy Power spent to explode with Holy light for $326731s1 damage to nearby enemies,][]$?(c1|c2|c3)[ and have $s1% increased duration.][]

description_blz.en_US: Avenging Wrath and Avenging Crusader reduce Holy Shock's cooldown by 50%, and have 25% increased duration.
description_blz.es_MX: Cólera vengativa y Cruzado vengador reducen un 50% el tiempo de reutilización de Choque sagrado, y su duración aumenta un 25%.
description_blz.pt_BR: Ira Vingativa e Cruzado Vingador reduzem em 50% a recarga de Choque Sagrado, e suas durações aumentam em 25%.
description_blz.de_DE: 'Zornige Vergeltung' und 'Kreuzzug der Vergeltung' verringern die Abklingzeit von 'Heiliger Schock' um 50% und die Dauer wird um 25% erhöht.
description_blz.en_GB: Avenging Wrath and Avenging Crusader reduce Holy Shock's cooldown by 50%, and have 25% increased duration.
description_blz.es_ES: Cólera vengativa y Cruzado vengativo reducen un 50% el tiempo de reutilización de Choque Sagrado, y su duración aumenta un 25%.
description_blz.fr_FR: Courroux vengeur et Croisé vengeur réduisent le temps de recharge de Horion sacré de 50 %, et leur durée est augmentée de 25 %.
description_blz.it_IT: Ira Vendicatrice e Crociato Vendicatore riducono il tempo di recupero di Folgore Sacra del 50% e hanno una durata aggiuntiva del 25%.
description_blz.ru_RU: Во время действия "Гнева карателя" и "Рыцаря-мстителя" время восстановления "Шока небес" сокращается на 50%, а время действия этих способностей увеличивается на 25%.
description_blz.ko_KR: 응징의 격노 및 응징의 성전사 사용 시 신성 충격의 재사용 대기시간이 50%만큼 감소하고, 또한 지속시간이 25%만큼 증가합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 復仇之怒和復仇十字軍會使神聖震擊的冷卻時間縮短50%。同時其持續時間也會延長25%。
description_blz.zh_CN: 复仇之怒和复仇十字军使神圣震击的的冷却时间缩短50%，且持续时间延长25%。
